phrs.translation: 藐视, 践踏, 摒弃, 一脚踢开

sentences.sentence: I asked, hurt that this guy, of all people, would spurn me.
sentences.translation: 我问，有些伤心。这个人，所有的人，仿佛看不起拒绝了我。

sentences.sentence: As an armyman, I spurn fearlessly at all danger and the enemy.
sentences.translation: 作为一个军人，一切危险和敌人丝毫不在我的眼下。

sentences.sentence: Don't spurn them if you can help it - they will not want to give you an answer again.
sentences.translation: 不要拒绝他们假如你也能帮忙，否则他们不会再给你答案了。
